column4: Someone who could help with a wireless hell?I can't get it working!
ok so what is wrong exactly
kitche:Don't know, but I can't online wireless!
ok so does your wireless use any type of encryption
Kitche: Well, when I was using xp I only typed in the wepkey and was online!I'm really new to ubuntu
ah ok you probably don't have your wep key in ubuntu go to System>Networking
does that see your wireless card by chance?
Kitche: It just says wireless connetction eth1 is not active
ok so it sees it click on that card then go to properties
Kitche: I've done that and typed in the wepkey but still it's dead
well click on the card then activate it :)
it's not active so it can't be used to use your network
Kitche: Hmm..done so several times but nuttin happens
well ubuntu for me is slow to actually do stuff though the net for some reason takes me 5 minutes just to load a page
